abstract: Mary Lou Bruner of East Texas is defeated in Texas Republican primary runoff election in her campaign for seat on State Board of Education; Bruner had posted extreme views of politics and education on her Facebook page, including derogatory statements about Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: Mary Lou Bruner, who claimed President Obama was a drug-addicted gay prostitute in his youth, was defeated in the Republican primary for a seat on the State Board of Education.

headline.main: Texan Who Posted Extreme Views Loses Runoff for State Education Post
headline.print_headline: Texan Who Posted Extreme Views Loses G.O.P. Runoff for State Education Board

snippet: Mary Lou Bruner, who claimed President Obama was a drug-addicted gay prostitute in his youth, was defeated in the Republican primary for a seat on the State Board of Education.
